channel.title: Hugo on Software and tech | Kristoffer Lorentsen

item.title: Drawing diagrams for use with Hugo - what software to choose?
item.description: Now that I have a blog going the first thing I am pretty certain that I’ll need is some tool or software to draw diagrams with. More often than not, when discussing or writing about software, a diagram just helps with explaining what is going on. In this post I explore my options and explain how I set up my tool(s) of choice. The candidates I quick round of good ol’ googling gave me the following options.
